name: misdistribution
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact that people or things are spread out or supplied in a way that is not fair or right: The system is suffering as a result of understaffing and misdistribution of the existing workforce. This indicated a serious problem of income misdistribution. Related word
distribution
More examplesFewer examplesA serious problem is the current scarcity and misdistribution of mental health professionals.There is an enormous misdistribution of occupational autonomy.The misdistribution of the benefits of free trade is one reason why anti-trade sentiments have risen sharply.
